title: FROM EDITORS TO ALGORITHMS A Values-Based Approach to Understanding Story Selection in the Facebook News Feed
abstract: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS The author thanks Eileen Emerson for her research assistance, as well as Kerric Harvey, David Karpf, and Emily Thorson of The George Washington University for their guidance and support during the initial research on this piece. The author also thanks the anonymous reviewers, William Marler, and the members of Aaron Shaw’s “Bring Your Own Research” group at Northwestern University for their feedback on the manuscript.
